new_tgt_summary: In Chapter 1064, titled "The Doom of Arrowhead Corporation," chaos erupts at a military base as a special forces unit led by Kutepov successfully infiltrates the camp and plants a beacon for an airstrike. After reaching safety, they call in Russian stealth bombers, which strike two ammunition depots and two fuel storage facilities, causing massive explosions that devastate the camp and result in heavy casualties among the guards. Amidst the flames and destruction, medics and engineers work to rescue injured personnel and recover unexploded munitions. A soldier named Salders expresses despair as he witnesses the devastation, while mercenaries realize that the attack is just the beginning of their troubles, as the Sami forces, under Jiang Chen's command, prepare to launch an assault on the weakened base. Over six thousand Sami forces charge toward the burning military base, causing panic and low morale among the mercenaries, many of whom desert and flee into the woods. Jiang Chen, summoning an all-terrain motorcycle and accompanied by Aisha, rides to the base, where they find it in turmoil. Aisha quickly eliminates guards around the command post, while Jiang Chen unexpectedly encounters Salders fleeing in panic with other officers. He subdues Salders, the General Manager of Arrowhead Corporation, by pinning him against a Humvee. Despite their first meeting, Jiang Chen accesses Salders' personal information through a holographic helmet. Salders, defiant and unwilling to cooperate, demands to be killed instead of answering questions. Jiang Chen injects him with a truth serum, rendering Salders unable to resist, and under its influence, he reveals that Carmen is in the research facility of an underground bunker, accessible via a lift located at the base's center, next to two helipads.
